page.title: 04Our Local Football Teams
page.content: The{Swifts}is the name of the local football team in Hill of Beath whose home football ground is Keirs Park. They have had a very good football record since they were first founded in 1972.At the moment the team is only for under 16's but next season the team will be open for under 18's.There are five people on the committee and the team usually play on Sundays but in the next season they will play on Saturdays.Two of their star players play for the under 18 Scotland squad and another player has signed on for the Dundee Utd. boys club. The Hill of Beath{Hawthorns}are the older local club and they were formed in 1970 and they also play at Keirs Park. The{Haws},their nickname,play in the junior league and came 5'th in the league this season.
